creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: three separate paintings attached to sheet: sprig of violets; delicate yellow flowers with insect; delicate white flowers on long thin stem with grasses extending toward UL
dimension:
2 3/4 × 2 5/8 in. (6.99 × 6.67 cm) (image, ULC: violets)
2 5/8 × 2 11/16 in. (6.67 × 6.83 cm) (image, center: yellow flowers)
7 3/16 × 1 3/8 in. (18.26 × 3.49 cm) (image, R: white flowers)
markings: violet: seals URC; yellow flowers: seal LRC; white flowers: seals R edge
signed: violet: signature URC; yellow flowers: signature LRC; white flowers: signature R
title: Three Small Flower Paintings
